means: [地]潜没（指地壳的板块沉到另一板块之下）

word_mean: 下转，眼球下转：特指由眼下直肌的下拉作用使眼球下转。同infraduction

sentence.Network_en: Certain parts of the plate boundaries along subduction zones appear to be aseismic.
sentence.Network_cn: 沿消减带的某些板块边界似乎长期无震.

sentence.Network_en: Modeling of lower mantle seismic anisotropy beneath subduction zones.
sentence.Network_cn: 在subduction带较低的冲积层地震各向异性的模拟.

sentence.Network_en: Mountain Building occurs during rapid subduction of one plate under another.
sentence.Network_cn: 当一个板块迅速地挤压到另一个板块下面时会发生造山运动.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 地质专业词汇英语翻译(Q-Z) ... subducting plate 俯冲板块 subduction 俯冲 subduction zone 俯冲带.
隐没 (Subduction)一个地块以断层或摺皱(或者两者皆有)的型式下潜到另一个板块的下方的过程称之为隐没或隐没作用。
石油英语词汇(S7)--石油百科 ... subduction zone 俯冲带 subduction 减除；减法；俯冲 subdue 征服.

大陆碰撞造山带常常伴随陆壳双倍的加厚,加厚有两种极端机制:①两个陆壳的叠置,本文称之陆内俯冲作用(intracontinental subduction);②推土机式增厚(bulldozer.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1970s: via French from Latin subductio(n-), from subduct- 'drawn from below', from the verb subducere

means.word_mean: 1. a geological process in which one edge of a crustal plate is forced sideways and downward into the mantle below another plate
